H0.text: What red fruit-juice-based drink whose name alludes to energy was first produced by John Noel Nichols in Manchester, 1908. Ribena

H1.text: What red fruit-juice-based drink whose name alludes to energy was first produced by John Noel Nichols in Manchester, 1908. Lucozade

H2.text: What red fruit-juice-based drink whose name alludes to energy was first produced by John Noel Nichols in Manchester, 1908. Irn-Bru

H3.text: What red fruit-juice-based drink whose name alludes to energy was first produced by John Noel Nichols in Manchester, 1908. Vimto

A4.text: Lucozade was created by William Walker Hunter in 1927 in Newcastle

A5.text: Lucozade is a glucose and water solution, not a red fruit-juice-based drink

A6.text: Vimto was created in 1908 in Manchester by John Noel Nichols

A7.text: Vimto is a British mixed fruit soft drink containing the juice of grapes, raspberries, and blackcurrants
